actions: Absorbs fluids, reduces swelling and eliminates toxins
Regulates Qi, invigorates the Blood Clears Heat.
Expels Wind-Cold-Dampness, unblocks painful obstruction and alleviates pain
Dissipates Blood Stasis, breaks up Stagnation and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, reduces swelling, promotes the discharge of pus, expels Wind-Dampness from the channels and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Invigorates the Blood, dissipates masses, reduces swellings, detoxifies, opens the channels, alleviates pain and inhibits the growth of cancer cells.
Inhibits the growth of cancer cells
syndromes: Qi and Blood Stagnation with Heat

symptoms: Pain that is fixed, stabbing and /or severe
Blue, dark or purplish discoloration of skin in small or large areas,
Tendency to hemorrhage dark blood or clots
manifestations.tongue: Purple, possible purple or red spots Red purple if there is Heat Blue purple if there is Cold

notes: Decoct the herbs, except Fr. Polygoni Multiflori Shu Hong Huang Zi, to make a paste. The Moschus She Xiang is added at the end of the decoction. Spread the paste on a piece of cloth to place over the mass. Make the plaster the same size as the mass. Meanwhile, pound the Fr. Polygoni Multiflori Shu Hong Huang Zi into a powder, immerse it in 1 kg of heated wine and drink frequently until the mass disappears.
